item.description:
This one is for the suburban drinking buddies. Sorry I forgot to post it with all of the Patriots game distractions.

The Red Sox Natives have been organizing Patriots Game Watching Events over the past 4 months with up to 60 people attending at Boston, Wakefield, and Woburn venues.

Now it is time for the Red Sox Natives first Happy Hour of 2012 followed by a Bruins Game Viewing Option.

Harrington's Food and Spirits in downtown Wakefield is a cozy Irish Restaurant and Pub with two floors. We have been there before. The food is great and the full menu is available for purchase. 

Arrive early by 6:00pm and get yourself a prime seat to enjoy some pre-game socializing. Stop by for drinks, stay for dinner and stick around to watch the Bruins game. Or arrive later and stay until whenever.

Game time is 7:05 PM for the Bruins vs the New Jersey Devils.

There is free parking in downtown Wakefield in the public lot across from Harrington's in front of Bank of America and along Water and Main Streets. The location is T accessible by the 136 and 137 Bus from the Orange Line in Malden Center and Commuter Rail accessible from North Station by the Reading and Haverhill Trains stopping at Wakefield Station, less than a 10 minute walk up Albion Street 1 block, right on to to Main Street and 1 block to Water Street. If you are joining us from the City the Commuter rail is the way to go. 

There is no cover.

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS!

Please RSVP  if you think you will attend. Invite guests, friends, and co-workers. We have over 20 RSVPs from the Red Sox Natives and Wakefield Weeknights.

We hope to see you there.

Fenway Frank
item.how_to_find_us: We will be att he bar on the first floor.
item.name: Happy Hour followed by Bruins Game Watching Option at Harrington's Pub
